title: TD Expands U.S. Footprint With $13.4 Billion Acquisition of First Horizon
sub_head: Toronto-Dominion says it is accelerating its long-term growth strategy
body:
Toronto-Dominion Bank said it is accelerating its long-term growth strategy in the U.S. by acquiring Tennessee-based First Horizon Bank for $13.4 billion.
The Canadian banking and financial services company said it would pay $25 a share in the all-cash transaction.
